title: Type ID : True Grit Intro
content:
I'm sure this is an easy font to spot, but not in my case. I thought it was Gotham related, but the "E" seems a tad different. Can someone help me with this? Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018114630im_/http:/typophile.com/files/grit-type_3966.png)
author: zerimar3

comments.content: After some quick research I'm guessing it may be Sackers Gothic. Yes?
